heroConfig.heroSubtitle: Your sanctuary for professional waxing and beauty treatments.

services.name: Luxury Facial Treatment
services.description: A rejuvenating facial treatment customized to your skin type. Includes cleansing, exfoliation, extraction, massage, and a nourishing mask.

services.name: Full Leg Waxing
services.description: Our professional waxing service leaves your legs smooth and hair-free for weeks. We use high-quality, gentle wax for sensitive skin.

services.name: Eyebrow Shaping & Tinting
services.description: Perfectly sculpted and tinted eyebrows to frame your face. Our experts will create the ideal shape and color to enhance your features.

services.name: Relaxing Swedish Massage
services.description: A classic full-body massage using long, flowing strokes to reduce tension, improve circulation, and promote deep relaxation.

featuredServices.name: Featured Facial
featuredServices.description: An exclusive facial treatment only available for a limited time. Experience pure bliss.

featuredServices.name: Deluxe Pedicure
featuredServices.description: Pamper your feet with our deluxe pedicure, including a soak, scrub, mask, and massage.

featuredServices.name: Hot Stone Massage
featuredServices.description: Melt away tension with our hot stone massage, using smooth, heated stones for deep relaxation.

featuredServices.name: Full Body Scrub
featuredServices.description: Exfoliate and hydrate your skin with our invigorating full-body scrub treatment.

reviews.name: Jessica M.
reviews.comment: An absolutely divine experience! The best facial I've ever had. My skin feels incredible. I'll definitely be back.

reviews.name: Sarah L.
reviews.comment: The waxing service was so quick and virtually painless. The staff are so professional and friendly. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Emily R.
reviews.comment: I floated out of Eden Spa after my massage. A truly relaxing atmosphere and a wonderful escape from the city.

reviews.name: Michael B.
reviews.comment: Great attention to detail on the eyebrow shaping. The tint color was perfect. Very happy with the result.

whyChooseUsItems.title: Expert Estheticians
whyChooseUsItems.description: Our certified professionals are passionate about their craft and dedicated to providing personalized care.

whyChooseUsItems.title: Premium Products
whyChooseUsItems.description: We use only high-quality, gentle, and effective products to ensure the best results for your skin.

whyChooseUsItems.title: Tranquil Atmosphere
whyChooseUsItems.description: Escape the everyday hustle in our serene and beautifully designed sanctuary built for your relaxation.

seasonalOffer.title: Seasonal Rejuvenation Package
seasonalOffer.description: Indulge in our limited-time offer! Get a Luxury Facial and a 30-minute back massage for just $150. A perfect escape to refresh your body and soul.

whatsappMessage: Hello! I am interested in your services.
contactTip: For urgent inquiries, please call us. For all other questions, feel free to use the WhatsApp chat!
